title: Faild to build aarch64 docker image
body:
ERROR [builder 11/11] RUN --mount=type=cache,target=/root/.cache     --mount=type=cache,target=/tmp/go-build     --mount=type=cache,target=/go/pkg/mod     make all                                                                 53.8s
------                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
 > [builder 11/11] RUN --mount=type=cache,target=/root/.cache     --mount=type=cache,target=/tmp/go-build     --mount=type=cache,target=/go/pkg/mod     make all:                                                                             
0.922 musl libc (aarch64)                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
0.922 Version 1.2.3                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
0.922 Dynamic Program Loader                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
0.922 Usage: /lib/ld-musl-aarch64.so.1 [options] [--] pathname                                                                                                                                                                                
0.943 /app/turbo/silkworm/silkworm_compat_check.sh: line 32: components[1]: unbound variable                                                                                                                                                  
4.379 Building erigon                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
53.78 # github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cmd/erigon                                                                                                                                                                                              
53.78 /usr/local/go/pkg/tool/linux_arm64/link: running g++ failed: exit status 1                                                                                                                                                              
53.78 /usr/lib/gcc/aarch64-alpine-linux-musl/12.2.1/../../../../aarch64-alpine-linux-musl/bin/ld: cannot find -lsilkworm_capi: No such file or directory                                                                                      
53.78 collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status                                                                                                                                                                                              
53.78 
53.79 make: *** [Makefile:110: erigon.cmd] Error 1
------
Dockerfile.arm:16
--------------------
  15 |     
  16 | >>> RUN --mount=type=cache,target=/root/.cache \
  17 | >>>     --mount=type=cache,target=/tmp/go-build \
  18 | >>>     --mount=type=cache,target=/go/pkg/mod \
  19 | >>>     make all
  20 |     
--------------------
ERROR: failed to solve: process "/bin/sh -c make all" did not complete successfully: exit code: 2

[dockerfile.txt](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/files/13896729/dockerfile.txt)
